Articles.Content:
> 
> Umm I would anticipate this mod being featured on his channel within the week. If not tomorrow.

Nope, I have too many young viewers.

> 
> nope, i have too many young viewers.

lmao XD

> 
> Nope, I have too many young viewers.

Honestly Im trying to picture you describe orbital mechanics while looking at frankenmanley..... I dont think it would work out. I want to dl this head pack just so I can launch it into Kerbol. Ill have to revive my sundiver rocket for 1.0.4

> 
> Nope, I have too many young viewers.

I will do it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> i will do it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

do it dennis! Do it!

> 
> Nope, I have too many young viewers.

I guess this is at least PEGI-35, because I'm not sure I'm old enough to see this thing animated.
Well... son of a motherless goat... I must say, this is the most disturbing thing I've witnessed here... ever...

> 
> Well... son of a motherless goat... I must say, this is the most disturbing thing I've witnessed here... ever...

[You](http://i.imgur.com/EeIXnPs.png) [must](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/kerbalspaceprogram/images/c/c6/Krakenkerbal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/398?cb=20141011170415) [be](http://i.imgur.com/PZgBAyy.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4wiNqcqdTPM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 [here](http://i.imgur.com/mUix20w.png).
Holy crap I just dropped what I was holding

> 
> Found it. This post here: [https://de.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/31p236/a_while_ago_i_decided_to_try_and_make_a_scott/](https://de.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/31p236/a_while_ago_i_decided_to_try_and_make_a_scott/)
> But it looks different.

Holy crap. I think that one's even scarier.

> 
> [You](http://i.imgur.com/EeIXnPs.png) [must](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/kerbalspaceprogram/images/c/c6/Krakenkerbal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/398?cb=20141011170415) [be](http://i.imgur.com/PZgBAyy.jpg)

>  [here](http://i.imgur.com/mUix20w.png).

What the heck is going on in that last one?!?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-21T00:01:21Z" title="07/21/2015 12:01  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 21, 2015</time> by Mitchz95**

> 
> [You](http://i.imgur.com/EeIXnPs.png) [must](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/kerbalspaceprogram/images/c/c6/Krakenkerbal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/398?cb=20141011170415) [be](http://i.imgur.com/PZgBAyy.jpg)

>  [here](http://i.imgur.com/mUix20w.png).

I wish... I've seen things you would never believe... except you probably would if you've been here a long time.

I actually have a question? How hard would it be to take pics of my children, my wife, myself and well any one I can think of and make this ? just curious >![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This is becoming famous for all the wrong reasons.

Someone get this on the next Modding Monday.

**PLEASE GET THIS ON MODDING MONDAY**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-21T02:46:48Z" title="07/21/2015 02:46  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 21, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**
This is simply terrifying.

> 
> I actually have a question? How hard would it be to take pics of my children, my wife, myself and well any one I can think of and make this ? just curious >![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well It won't be so hard. I just need good photos and some time.

But I don't really want to make something like THIS again xD
jesus christ
This is creepy. I've been playing XCOM lately and for a moment I thought I was on the wrong forum.

> 
> Well It won't be so hard. I just need good photos and some time.
> But I don't really want to make something like THIS again xD

Na, I was thinking of doing it myself if not too hard then I looked at the PNG file and was like " oh crap that is going to be a lot of editing". Thanks though.
pzl no good

> 
> ....
> But I don't really want to make something like THIS again xD

I think it's fair to say we all share the hope that nobody will ever make anything like this ever again.

> 
> I actually have a question? How hard would it be to take pics of my children, my wife, myself and well any one I can think of and make this ? just curious >![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There is a lot of surface on a kerbals head.

Just saying.

> What the heck is going on in that last one?!?

IIRC it was an old and fairly rare lightning bug. There's been a Reddit thread about this, full of obvious Event Horizon references.

> 
> I think it's fair to say we all share the hope that nobody will ever make anything like this ever again.

At least I won't do something similiar to this again ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
My poor eyes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
